thread.title: Bollywood actress' private pictures leaked online
thread.title_full: Bollywood actress' private pictures leaked online

title: Bollywood actress' private pictures leaked online
text:
Bollywood actress' private pictures leaked online Web Report Filed on February 15, 2017 | Last updated on February 15, 2017 at 12.10 pm Share 
(Facebook/amyjackson) Amy had visited a local mobile store in London before her flight to Mumbai. Bollywood actress Amy Jackson's personal pictures were leaked online after she fell prey to a cyber attack recently. While in London, she went to a local mobile store as she couldn't access her iCloud account. But as she arrived in Mumbai, she realized her phone was hacked. She was shocked to find her personal photos taken during a dinner with a friend shared on social media. Amy isn't the one to watch these pictures splashed online and has taken the matter in her hands. She will be filling a complaint with the cyber cell in her hometown, London and Mumbai. News reports quoted her saying, "I was shocked when this happened. This isn't a trivial matter and has to be taken up seriously. I will register a complaint with the cybercrime cell in London and ensure the hackers are taken to task. Cyber safety is the need of the hour." She will next seen acting opposite Rajnikanth in Indian science fiction film 2.0, directed by Shankar. This film will be her second film with the director after Vikram starrer 'I'.
